title: in search of the miraculous, fragments of an unknown teaching

sources.title: in search of the miraculous, fragments of an unknown teaching
sources.description: a film directed by zivko nicolic, script adaptation by milan peters based onï»¿ the 1949 book by p.d.ouspensky. sidney:fairway films in association with znak productions belgrade, 1998, 42 min. black & white. thoughtfully telescopes ouspensky's book and glimpses of the teaching he received from gurdjieff, interspersed with archival footage the russia revolution.
